tuv.seg: The type of product that is being brought into the warehouse.^ ~Product Stock~
O produto que está sendo estocado no armazém.^
This area shows the stock of the product in the unit.
Each box represents one cargo of the product. Each cargo can store a certain number of units of the product.^^The number of units a cargo can hold varies from product to product.
A quantidade de estoque em cada unidade.^

For some expensive products, such as cars, one cargo can hold only a few units of the product. For lower-cost products, such as shampoo, one cargo can hold up to several thousand units of the product.
This makes the total value of all cargoes of all types of products about the same.^ ~Supply and Demand Bar~
A barra amarela indica o fornecimento.
The yellow bar indicates the supply of the product from the source. The orange bar indicates the demand of the product from the current firm.^
A barra laranja indica a demanda pela firma atual.^
This brown bar shows the utilization of the unit. If this bar reaches its full length, the unit has reached its full capacity.
A barra marrom indica a utilização da unidade.^
